item.name: Valores processador por segundo pelo servidor Zabbix

resource.name: Processo de coleta de dados Zabbix ocupado %

trigger.expression: {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[vcache,buffer,pfree].min(10m)}<5
trigger.name: Menos de 5% livre no valor de cache

trigger.expression: {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[rcache,buffer,pfree].min(10m)}<25
trigger.name: Menos de 25% livre no cache de configuração
trigger.description: Considere aumentar CacheSize em zabbix_server.conf arquivo de configuração

trigger.expression: {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[wcache,history,pfree].min(10m)}<25
trigger.name: Menos de 25% livre no cache do histórico

trigger.expression: {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[wcache,text,pfree].min(10m)}<25
trigger.name: Menos de 25% livre no cache do histórico de texto

trigger.expression: {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[wcache,trend,pfree].min(10m)}<25
trigger.name: Menos de 25% livre no cache de trends

trigger.expression: {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[vmware,buffer,pfree].min(10m)}<25
trigger.name: Menos de 25% livre no cache do vmware

trigger.expression: {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[queue,10m].min(10m)}>100
trigger.name: Mais de 100 itens com dados em falta por mais de 10 minutos
trigger.description: zabbix[queue,10m] item is collecting data about how many items are missing data for more than 10 minutes (next parameter)

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,alerter,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,alerter,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix alerta processos mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,configuration syncer,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,configuration syncer,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos de configuração de sincronização mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,db watchdog,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,db watchdog,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix db processos watchdog mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,discoverer,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,discoverer,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos de descoberta mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,escalator,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,escalator,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos em escala mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,history syncer,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,history syncer,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos de soncronização de histórico mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,housekeeper,avg,busy].avg(30m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,housekeeper,avg,busy].avg(30m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos housekeeper mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,http poller,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,http poller,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos http poller mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,icmp pinger,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,icmp pinger,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos icmp pinger mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,ipmi poller,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,ipmi poller,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos ipmi poller mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,java poller,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,java poller,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos java poller mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,poller,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,poller,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos poller mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,proxy poller,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,proxy poller,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos proxy poller mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,self-monitoring,avg,busy].min(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,self-monitoring,avg,busy].min(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos de auto monitoramento mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,snmp trapper,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,snmp trapper,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos snmp trapper mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,timer,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,timer,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos de temporizador mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,trapper,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,trapper,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos trapper mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,unreachable poller,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,unreachable poller,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos poller inacessíveis mais de 75% ocupado

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,vmware collector,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,vmware collector,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix processos coletor vmware mais de 75% ocupado

graph.name: Zabbix processo de coleta de dados ocupado %
